text.text_translated:
DART is a test to change a small space rock.  
The test will hit Didymoon.  
Didymoon is the small moon of Didymos.  
Didymoon is about 150 metres wide.  
Didymos is about 800 metres wide.  
The hit will knock Didymoon out of its orbit.  
Scientists hope Earth telescopes can see the change.

best_attempt.text_translated:
There is a test called DART.  
DART stands for Double Asteroid Redirection Test.  
The test will hit Didymoon.  
Didymoon is a small moon of the asteroid Didymos.  
Didymoon is about 150 metres wide.  
Didymos is about 800 metres wide.  
The test will try to knock Didymoon out of its orbit.  
Scientists hope the change will be enough for Earth telescopes to see.
